name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and special sauce on a sesame seed bun.

name: Cheese Burger
description: The classic burger topped with melted cheddar cheese for an extra burst of flavor.

name: Bacon Burger
description: A mouthwatering burger featuring crispy bacon strips, melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Savor the rich flavors of saut√©ed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese atop a perfectly grilled burger patty.

name: BBQ Burger
description: Indulge in the smoky goodness of barbecue sauce, crispy onion rings, and tangy pickles on a flame-grilled burger.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious plant-based patty served with fresh lettuce, tomato, onion, and creamy avocado spread on a whole wheat bun.
